pages.text: The Tinker's Anvil can also be used to forge armor pieces. Most modded metals are supported, meaning you can forge Helmets, Chestplates, Leggings, and Boots from various mods or metals.

pages.title: Helmets
pages.text: Any metal helmet requires five ingots to forge. The default rules for forging it are: Bend Last, Bend Second Last, and Hit Third Last.

pages.title: Chestplates
pages.text: Any metal chestplate requires eight ingots to forge. The default rules for forging it are: Hit Last, Bend Any, and Upset Any.

pages.title: Leggings
pages.text: Any metal leggings require seven ingots to forge. The default rules for forging them are: Hit Any, Bend Any, and Draw Any.

pages.title: Boots
pages.text: Any metal boots require four ingots to forge. The default rules for forging them are: Bend Last, Bend Second Last, and Shrink Third Last.
